THANK YOU for downloading this Free Trial! By downloading and using these files, you agree to the following terms:

1. ROYALTY-FREE USE You are allowed to use these sounds, presets, and loops in your own music productions (tracks, remixes, soundtracks). You can release your music on Spotify, Beatport, SoundCloud, etc., without paying any additional royalties to DEAT AKA. Keep 100% of your earnings.

2. NO REDISTRIBUTION OR RESALE You are NOT allowed to:

Resell, share, or upload this pack (or parts of it) to any other website, torrent, or file-sharing service.

Include these sounds in another sample pack, drum kit, or sound library for sale or free download.

Resell the individual sounds as standalone sound effects.

3. COPYRIGHT All sounds and presets remain the property of DEAT AKA. This license grants you the right to USE them, not to own the copyright of the sound recording itself.
